article_title: CNN's Reliable Sources Covers The "Propaganda" Of Hannity's Fake Obamacare Victims
article_text:
ABOUT THE VIDEOS

In addition to reviewing print and online media, Media Matters monitors at least 150 hours of television and radio each week. This section features highlights (or low-lights) from our monitoring efforts, other noteworthy clips as well as original videos.

og.description: From the October 20 edition of CNN's Reliable Sources:
og.title: CNN's Reliable Sources Covers The "Propaganda" Of Hannity's Fake Obamacare Victims
